CustomField.description:
The query that should be used to fetch the items to display
The query should use the :recordId parameter to indicate the "Parent record" id. Ex:
To get all cases related to the account: SELECT Subject FROM Case WHERE AccountId = :recordId
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SOQL query for fetching hightlight items. The id of the parent record is passed as :recordId
CustomField.label: Items Query
